CustomField.description: This field is manually populated. The percentage of the value of collateral that a lender uses to determine the amount of a loan.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(LLC_BI__Advance_Rate_Override__c) || LLC_BI__Advance_Rate_Override__c == 0), LLC_BI__Advance_Rate_Override__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(LLC_BI__Auto_Applied_Advance_Rate__c) || LLC_BI__Auto_Applied_Advance_Rate__c == 0), LLC_BI__Auto_Applied_Advance_Rate__c, LLC_BI__Collateral__r.LLC_BI__Collateral_Type__r.LLC_BI__Advance_Rate__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The percentage of the value of collateral that a lender uses to determine the amount of a loan.
CustomField.label: Advance Rate
